name: suttacentral-static
description: A fast and minimal alternative frontend for SuttaCentral.net

scripts.build:nav: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" SKIP_TEXTS=1 pnpm exec eleventy
scripts.build:texts: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=16384" ONLY_TEXTS=1 pnpm exec eleventy
scripts.build:utils: NODE_ENV=prod NODE_OPTIONS="--max-old-space-size=8192" ONLY_UTILS=1 pnpm exec eleventy
scripts.dev:fresh: pnpm run predeploy && pnpm run dev
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf _site && pnpm run build && pnpm run build:search

author: benmneb
